name: High School Family Vacation 2
description:
Hey Kids, Are you ready for a wonderful family vacation? If yes, come and join us in this High School Family Vacation game and enjoy tons of interesting activities. First of all you have to collect all the things that you need for the family vacation and then check in. Don't forget to collect the printout. In this game, you have a chance to show your cleaning skills to clean the swimming pool properly and don't forget to change sheets and carpets in the room. Now it's time to dress up, Select an amazing dress up accessories and get a new look for vacation. Kids are so much happy at the moment. Complete each and every fun and entertaining activities in the game and enjoy your family vacation

Features:

- Clean the room with various cleaning tools

- Help kids to increase their knowledge in planning trips

- Best summer vacation game

- Interesting mini game

- Easy to play for toddlers of all ages

- Have fun in this High School Family Vacation
